verses.name: John 9:1
verses.text: And as Jesus passed by, he saw a man which was blind from his birth.

verses.name: John 9:2
verses.text: And his disciples asked him, saying, Master, who did sin, this man, or his parents, that he was born blind?

verses.name: John 9:3
verses.text: Jesus answered, Neither hath this man sinned, nor his parents: but that the works of God should be made manifest in him.

verses.name: John 9:4
verses.text: I must work the works of him that sent me, while it is day: the night cometh, when no man can work.

verses.name: John 9:5
verses.text: As long as I am in the world, I am the light of the world.
